name: Create MailerLite subscribers from Google Sheets rows.
description: Every time a new Google Sheets row is added, Make will automatically add a new subscriber to a group in MailerLite. This example uses the sheet in [this link](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0).
